bookSourceGroup: 🍿 日常,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '完结漫画',
    '连载漫画'
];
orderby = [
    'wanjie',
    'lianzai'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${orderby[i]}/index_{{page-1}}.html`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
exploreUrl.push(explore('最新上架', `{{Get('url')}}/new_coc.html`, 1, 0.25, false));
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
Order = `{{get('order',Get('p'))}}`;
kind = [
'热血机战','科幻未来','恐怖惊悚','推理悬疑','滑稽搞笑','恋爱生活','纯爱人生','体育竞技','纯情少女','魔法奇幻','武侠经典'
];
tag = [
'rexue','kehuan','kongbu','xuanyi','gaoxiao','love','danmei','tiyu','chunqing','qihuan','wuxia'
];
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${tag[j]}/index${Order}_{{page-1}}.html`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(50, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

JSON.stringify(headers);

var data = [];

var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
User = Checkwait(User);

    if (/wanjie|lianzai|new_coc/.test(baseUrl)) {
        var list = java.getElements('.ar_list_co ul li');
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = list[i].text();
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].select('img').attr('src') + ',{"headers":{"Referer":"' + Get('url') + '/"}}',
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('span a').attr('href')
            });
        }
        if (!baseUrl.includes("index")) {
            Data();
        } else {
            var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/index_(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'index_' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
            var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
            if (!list[0] || !next_1.select('.ar_list_co ul li')[0]) {
                Data();
            }
        }
    } else {
        var list = java.getElements('.ar_list_co dl');
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = list[i].select('h1').text();
            author = list[i].select('.author').text();
            kind = String(list[i].select('.status').text()).replace(/状态|[中已\s]/g, '') + ',' + String(list[i].select('.time').text()).replace(/时间/, '');
            intro = list[i].select('.info').text();
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': author,
                'kind': kind,
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': intro,
                'cover': list[i].select('img').attr('src') + ',{"headers":{"Referer":"' + Get('url') + '/"}}',
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('h1 a').attr('href')
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/(\d+).html/, function(match, p1) {return (parseInt(p1) + 1) + '.html';}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
        if (!list[0] || !next_1.select('.ar_list_co dl')[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"), e);
    return Get('url').replace(/www/, 'so') + '/k.php?k=' + e + '&p={{page}}';
}(key));

	}

<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/500);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];

if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}

for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*500)))
}

list
</js>

<js>
let list = [];
let p = java.getString(".page-link@text").match(/\d\/(\d+)/);
//java.log(p[1]);
for(let i = 1; i <= (p && p[1]? p[1] : 0); i++){  
  let uri = baseUrl;
  let href = uri + `index_${i}.html`;
  //java.log(href);
  list.push(href);
}
list
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author

ruleBookInfo.name: book_name

ruleContent.content:
let res = JSON.parse(result).data.content function getComic(result) { let mat = result.match(/
([\s\S]*?)<\/article>/); try { let cnt = JSON.parse( mat ? mat[1].replace(/\&/g, '"').replace(/\;/g, "").replace(/\#34/g, "") : result ); return (mat ? cnt.skeleton.data : cnt.picInfos) .map((i) => { let path = mat ? cnt.materials[i.element_name].data.web_uri : "novel-pic/" + i.md5; return ``; }) .join("
"); } catch (e) { // not comic content mat = result.match(/([\s\S]*?)<\/body>/) // java.log(result) return (mat ? mat[1] : result).toString().replace(/\<\!DOCTYPE html.*/g, "").replace(/\/, "").replace(/\\<\/a\>/g, "") } } result = getComic(String(res)); result.replace(/\{\!\-\- PGC_VOICE\:.*\-\-\}/g, "")

ruleExplore.author: $.author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
let replaceCover = (u) => {
// java.log(u)
if (u.startsWith("https://")) u = u.substring(8)
else u = u.substring(7)
let uArr = u.split("/")
uArr[0] = "https://p6-novel.byteimg.com/origin"
let uArr2 = []
uArr.forEach((x) => {
    if (!x.includes("?") && !x.includes("~")) uArr2.push(x)
    else uArr2.push(x.split("~")[0])
	})
u = uArr2.join("/")
return u
	}
  let list = [];
  let resultData = JSON.parse(result).data;
  // java.log(resultData)
  let data;
  if (resultData != null && resultData.book_shelf_info) {
    data = resultData.book_shelf_info;
    if (data != null) {
    let requestData = { books: [] };
    for (let i in data) {
      requestData["books"].push({
        book_id: data[i]["book_id"],
        item_id: "0",
      });
    }
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(resultData.book_shelf_info))
    let booksData = java.ajax(
      'https://fanqienovel.com/api/bookshelf/multidetail,{method: "post",body: ' +
        JSON.stringify(requestData) +
        "}"
    );
    // java.log(booksData)
    let books =  JSON.parse(booksData).data.detail_list;
    for (let i in books) {
      let d = books[i];
      list.push({
        src: d,
        book_name: d.book_name,
        thumb_url: replaceCover(d.thumb_url),
        abstract: d.abstract,
        book_id: d.book_id,
      });
    }
    }
  } else list = JSON.parse(result)[0].content
  JSON.stringify(list)
</js>$[*]
ruleExplore.name: $.book_name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
let res = JSON.parse(result)
let books

if (res.search_tabs) {
  res.search_tabs.forEach((i) => {
    if (i.tab_type == 3) books = i.data
  })
} else books = res.data

let results = []

books.forEach(w => {
  results.push(w.book_data[0])
})

JSON.stringify(results)
</js>$[*]

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

# 关于许可的额外声明（在线版本参见 GitHub，以在线版本为准）
- 当许可证与本声明冲突时，以本声明为准；
- 对于本仓库中的任意代码片段：按照 `MPL 2.0` 中有关约定执行；
- 对于本仓库中的某一完整书源的转载或二次开发，需满足以下全部条件：
  - 在[本仓库](https://github.com/jiwangyihao/source-j-legado)的 `issue` 中提出请求并具体说明转载地址、二次开发后的书源开源地址以及其他必要信息；
  - 等待原作者（即本仓库的初始所有者和初始代码贡献者 [@jiwangyihao](https://github.com/jiwangyihao)）查看并通过 `issue` 或依据原作者要求更改转载方式或补充更详细的信息。
  - 考虑到本项目弃坑的可能，新 `issue` 开启后超过 20 个工作日原作者没有回复或者原作者回复要求更改的 `issue` 在更改后超过 20 个工作日原作者没有回复即视为原作者通过该 `issue`：
    - 此处的 `issue` 仅包括在[本仓库](https://github.com/jiwangyihao/source-j-legado)开启的，处于「开启状态」的 issue。（也就是说，请不要在已经关闭的 issue 中回复）。
    - 对于此种方式通过的 issue，转载/二次开发者仍应当遵守本声明中已经写明的相关约定。
  - 不得上传至源仓库或整理至`非轻小说专用`的书源合集中并应当避免其他人将转载/二次开发版本上传至源仓库或整理至`非轻小说专用`的书源合集中：
    - 关于轻小说的定义的额外说明：不包括国内的原创网络文学作品（如 `SF 轻小说` 中的原创轻小说以及`起点中文网`中标签包含轻小说的作品）。
    - 轻小说专用的定义：有且仅有想看轻小说的人可能会添加。
  - 必须在转载/二次开发地址的明显位置完整包含本声明的全部内容。
  - 必须保留源注释中原有的更改记录。

}

list

            }
            result = json.content
        }</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
/*调试->右上角的小虫子，随便搜一个词*/
/*Token写了东西的话要删掉才能进行下面步骤：
①填上电话号码点调试会获取验证码；
②填上验证码点调试会获取token；
③把token填在Token【目录的章节url那也有个token记得也要填，不填的话从发现点的书是没有登录的】；
④把电话号码跟验证码的值删了【❗️填了电话号码会一搜索就发验证码】，保存书源*/
/*如登录过期需要重新登录，请删除以前填写的token再调试获取验证码，重复前面的步骤*/

电话号码="";

验证码="";

Token="34304776fc02d974a641eef13b603e20";

//下面不要动
var time = Math.round(new Date()/1000);
token=java.put('token',Token);
function sign(list){
var sb='';
sb+="Fb0gqLMSf5Android";
list=list.sort();
i=0;
while(i<list.length){
if(i==0){
sb+=list[i]
}else{
    if(list[i].match(/lang-app=/)){  
      i2=i+1;
     i3=i2+1;
     if (list[i2] != null && list[i2].match(/lang=/)) {
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i2];
                        
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i];
                        
                        i = i3;
                    }
           }
                sb+="&";
                sb+=list[i];             
      }
i++
}
sb+="AEdDtho2CjiH901aVK7swFqclu6NmzJ4";
return String(java.md5Encode(sb)).toUpperCase()
}



//获取验证码开始
num=电话号码;
y=验证码;
if(num.match(/^\d{11}$/) && !y  && !Token){
list2=[
 "mobile=86"+num,
"appId=",
"osType=2",
"product=1",
"sysVer=10",
"time="+time,
"token="+token,
"ver=2.1.3",
"packageName=com.lestory.jihua.an",
"lang-app=zh-Hans",
"lang=zh-hans",
"locale=CN"
]
s=sign(list2);
json2={ "mobile": "86"+String(num),"product":"1","ver":"2.1.3","sign":s,"sysVer":"10","locale":"CN","token":String(token),"lang-app":"zh-Hans","appId":"","osType":"2","time":time,"packageName":"com.lestory.jihua.an","lang":"zh-hans"}

option1={
"method": "POST",
"body": JSON.stringify(json2)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/message/send,'+JSON.stringify(option1);
java.log(JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).msg=="success"?"验证码发送成功，请注意短信":"验证码获取失败，请稍候再试");
}else if(y && !Token){
list2=[
 "mobile=86"+num,
"code="+y,
"appId=",
"osType=2",
"product=1",
"sysVer=10",
"time="+time,
"token="+token,
"ver=2.1.3",
"packageName=com.lestory.jihua.an",
"lang-app=zh-Hans",
"lang=zh-hans",

]
s=sign(list2);
json2={ "code":String(y),"mobile": "86"+String(num),"product":"1","ver":"2.1.3","sign":s,"sysVer":"10","locale":"CN","token":String(token),"lang-app":"zh-Hans","appId":"","osType":"2","time":time,"packageName":"com.lestory.jihua.an","lang":"zh-hans"}

option1={
"method": "POST",
"body": JSON.stringify(json2)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/user/mobile-login,'+JSON.stringify(option1);
a=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url));
java.log(a.msg=="success"?'❗️下面是你的Token，请复制❗️\n'+a.data.user_token:JSON.stringify(a));
}
//获取验证码结束

if (result.match(/阅读云/)) {
u = baseUrl.split(',')[0]
cookie.removeCookie(u)
// java.startBrowserAwait(u, "验证")
java.webView(null, u, "document.cookie")
ck = cookie.getCookie(u)
head = JSON.stringify({ headers: { 'Cookie': ck } })
url = u + "," + head
result = java.ajax(url)
}
result

    "headers": Headers
};

        cache.put("dmzj-sign", signdate);
    }
    Uid = cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "uid")) || '';
    Uid1 = cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "uid1")) || '';
    if (baseUrl.includes('/subscribeWithLevel')) {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result);
        for (i in list) {
            var s = '';
            var k = list[i].status.replace(/[中已]/g, '');
            var latest = list[i].sub_update + (list[i].sub_uptime > 0 ? ('〔' + String(java.timeFormat(list[i].sub_uptime*1000)).replace(/\//g, '-') + '〕') : '');
            var url = Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nnv4api') + '/v2/comic/detail/' + list[i].id + '?uid=' + Uid1;
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].name,
                'author': cache.get(java.md5Encode16(url + "Author")),
                'kind': s + ',' + k,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].sub_img,
                'url': url
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list || !list[0] || !JSON.parse(next)[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    } else if (baseUrl.includes('/getReInfoWithLevel/')) {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result);
        for (i in list) {
            var s = '';
            var k = '';
            var intro = '\nㅤ\n⏰时间：' + java.timeFormat(list[i].viewing_time) + '\n📖观看至：' + list[i].chapter_name;
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].comic_name,
                'author': cache.get(java.md5Encode16(url + "Author")),
                'kind': s + ',' + k,
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': intro,
                'cover': list[i].cover,
                'url': Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nnv4api') + '/v2/comic/detail/' + list[i].comic_id + '?uid=' + Uid1
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/(\d+)\?uid\=$/, function(match, p1) {return (parseInt(p1) + 1) + '?uid=';}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list || !list[0] || list[0].comic_id == JSON.parse(next)[0].comic_id) {
            Data();
        }
    } else if (baseUrl.includes('/rank/')) {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result);
        var D = ['日','周','月','总'];
        var K = ['人气:','吐槽:','订阅:'];
        var index = parseInt(baseUrl.replace(/.*(\d)\-\d\.json/, '$1'));
        var index1 = parseInt(baseUrl.replace(/.*rank\/(\d).*/, '$1'));
        for (i in list) {
            var s = D[index] + K[index1] + Num(list[i].num || list[i].vote_num || list[i].sub_num);
            var k = (list[i].status || '').replace(/[中已]/g, '') + ',' + (list[i].zone || list[i].readergroup || '') + ',' + list[i].types.replace(/\//g, ',');
            var latest = list[i].last_update_chapter_name || list[i].chapter_name;
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].name,
                'author': list[i].authors,
                'kind': s + ',' + k,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest + '〔' + String(java.timeFormat(list[i].last_updatetime*1000)).replace(/\//g, '-') + '〕',
                'intro': list[i].description,
                'cover': Get('url').replace(/www/, 'images') + '/' + list[i].cover,
                'url': Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nnv4api') + '/v2/comic/detail/' + list[i].id + '?uid=' + Uid1
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/(\d+).json$/, function(match, p1) {return (parseInt(p1) + 1) + '.json';}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list || !list[0] || !JSON.parse(next)[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    } else {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result);
        for (i in list) {
            var s = '✦ ' + Num(list[i].num);
            var k = list[i].status.replace(/[中已]/g, '') + ',' + list[i].types.replace(/\//g, ',');
            var latest = list[i].last_updatetime > 0 ? ('〔' + String(java.timeFormat(list[i].last_updatetime*1000)).replace(/\//g, '-') + '〕') : '';
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,
                'author': list[i].authors,
                'kind': s + ',' + k,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].cover,
                'url': Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nnv4api') + '/v2/comic/detail/' + list[i].id + '?uid=' + Uid1
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/(\d+).json$/, function(match, p1) {return (parseInt(p1) + 1) + '.json';}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list || !list[0] || !JSON.parse(next)[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
eval(String(source.header).replace(/<.*?>/g,''));
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
Headers.Authorization = ('Bearer ' + cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token"))) || '';
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (!cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token")) || cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token")) == '') {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {                                        
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的订阅', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/sub/list?status=0&firstLetter=&page={{page}}&size=20,${JSON.stringify(Option)}`, 1, 0.25, false));
        //exploreUrl.push(explore('浏览历史', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/sub/list?status=0&firstLetter=&page={{page}}&size=20,${JSON.stringify(Option)}`, 1, 0.25, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
T = `{{Get('t')}}`;
U = `{{Get('u')}}`;
url1 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=0&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('人气', url1, 1, 0.25, false));
url2 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=1&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('吐槽', url2, 1, 0.25, false));
url3 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=2&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('订阅', url3, 1, 0.25, false));
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var Url = Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api') + '/app/v1/comic/filter/classify';
var kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Url)).data.classifyList[0].list;
R = `{{Get('r')+1}}`;
Cate = `{{get('cate',Get('o'))}}`;
Status = `{{get('status',Get('p'))}}`;
Zone = `{{get('zone',Get('q'))}}`;
for (i in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/filter/list?theme=${kind[i].tagId}&cate=${Cate}&status=${Status}&zone=${Zone}&sortType=${R}&page={{page}}&size=20`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].tagName, url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

};

        var list =  JSON.parse(result).data.subList;
        for (i in list) {
            var s = '';
            var k = list[i].status.replace(/[中已]/g, '');
            var latest = list[i].last_update_chapter_name;
            var url = Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api') + '/app/v1/comic/detail/' + list[i].id + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option);
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,

                'kind': s + ',' + k,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].cover,
                'url': url
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list || !list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data.subList[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    } else if (baseUrl.includes('/rank/')) {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result).data;
        var D = ['日','周','月','总'];
        var K = ['人气:','吐槽:','订阅:'];

            var s = '';
            var k = (list[i].status || '').replace(/[中已]/g, '') + ',' + list[i].types.replace(/\//g, ',');
            var latest = list[i].last_update_chapter_name;
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,
                'author': list[i].authors,
                'kind': s + ',' + k,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest + '〔' + String(java.timeFormat(list[i].last_updatetime*1000)).replace(/\//g, '-') + '〕',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].cover,
                'url': Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api') + '/app/v1/comic/detail/' + list[i].comic_id + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option)
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list || !list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    } else {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result).data.comicList;
        for (i in list) {
            var s = '';
            var k = list[i].status.replace(/[中已]/g, '') + ',' + list[i].types.replace(/\//g, ',');
            var latest = list[i].last_update_chapter_name + (list[i].last_updatetime > 0 ? ('〔' + String(java.timeFormat(list[i].last_updatetime*1000)).replace(/\//g, '-') + '〕') : '');
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].name,
                'author': list[i].authors,
                'kind': s + ',' + k,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].cover,
                'url': Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api') + '/app/v1/comic/detail/' + list[i].id + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option)
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list || !list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data.comicList) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);

        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"), e);
    return Get('url') + '/api/v3/search/comic?q=' + e + '&limit=20&offset={{20*(page-1)}}&platform=3,{"headers":{"platform":"3","version":"9.9.9"}}';
}(key));

        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': author,
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': latest,
            'intro': '',
            'cover': list[i].imageUrl,
            'url': Get('url') + '/api/query,{"body":' + body + ',"headers":{"Content-Type":"application/json"},"method": "POST"}'
        });
    }
    Data();
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    var body = '{"operationName":"searchComicAndAuthorQuery","variables":{"keyword":"' + e + '"},"query":"query searchComicAndAuthorQuery($keyword: String!) {
  searchComicsAndAuthors(keyword: $keyword) {
    comics {
      id
      title
      status
      year
      imageUrl
      authors {
        id
        name
        __typename
      }
      categories {
        id
        name
        __typename
      }
      dateUpdated
      monthViews
      views
      favoriteCount
      lastBookUpdate
      lastChapterUpdate
      __typename
    }
    authors {
      id
      name
      chName
      enName
      wikiLink
      comicCount
      views
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}"}';
    return Get('url') + '/api/query,{"body":' + body + ',"headers":{"Content-Type":"application/json"},"method":"POST"}';
}(key));
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  分　　类  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '全部漫画',
    '最新上架'
];
orderby = [
    '/classify',
    '/list/new'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${orderby[i]}?page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.45, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','恋爱','纯爱','古风','异能','悬疑','剧情','科幻',
    '奇幻','玄幻','穿越','冒险','推理','武侠','格斗','战争',
    '热血','搞笑','大女主','都市','总裁','后宫','日常','韩漫',
    '少年','其他'
];
type = [
    'type=all','type=lianai','type=chunai','type=gufeng','type=yineng','type=xuanyi','type=juqing','type=kehuan',
    'type=qihuan','type=xuanhuan','type=chuanyue','type=mouxian','type=tuili','type=wuxia','type=gedou','type=zhanzheng',
    'type=rexie','type=gaoxiao','type=danuzhu','type=dushi','type=zongcai','type=hougong','type=richang','type=hanman',
    'type=shaonian','type=qita'
];
Region = `{{get('region',Get('o'))}}`;
State = `{{get('state',Get('q'))}}`;
Filter = `{{get('filter',Get('p'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/classify?${type[j]}${Region}${State}${Filter}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(30, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '人气',
    '更新',
    '评分',
    '收藏'
];
orderby = [
    '&orderby=click',
    '&orderby=date',
    '&orderby=score',
    '&orderby=shoucang'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/getsortlist/?comic_sort=${orderby[i]}&search_type=&search_key=&page={{page}}&size=48`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','热血','机战','运动','推理','冒险','搞笑','战争',
    '神魔','忍者','竞技','悬疑','社会','恋爱','宠物','吸血',
    '萝莉','后宫','御姐','霸总','玄幻','古风','历史','漫改',
    '游戏','穿越','恐怖','真人','科幻','都市','武侠','修真',
    '生活','动作'
];
link = [
    '','rexue','jizhan','yundong','tuili','maoxian','gaoxiao','zhanzhen',
    'shenmo','renzhe','jingji','xuanyi','shehui','lianai','chongwu','xixue',
    'luoli','hougong','yujie','bazong','xuanhuan','gufeng','lishi','mangai',
    'youxi','chuanyue','kongbu','zhenren','kehuan','dushi','wuxia','xiuzhen',
    'shenghuo','dongzuo'
];
OrderBy = `{{get('orderBy',Get('o'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/getsortlist/?comic_sort=${link[j]}${OrderBy}&search_type=&search_key=&page={{page}}&size=48`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(40, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '人气',
    '更新',
    '评分',
    '收藏'
];
orderby = [
    '&orderby=click',
    '&orderby=date',
    '&orderby=score',
    '&orderby=shoucang'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/getsortlist/?comic_sort=${orderby[i]}&search_type=&search_key=&page={{page}}&size=48`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','热血','机战','运动','推理','冒险','搞笑','战争',
    '神魔','忍者','竞技','悬疑','社会','恋爱','宠物','吸血',
    '萝莉','后宫','御姐','霸总','玄幻','古风','历史','漫改',
    '游戏','穿越','恐怖','真人','科幻','都市','武侠','修真',
    '生活','动作'
];
link = [
    '','rexue','jizhan','yundong','tuili','maoxian','gaoxiao','zhanzhen',
    'shenmo','renzhe','jingji','xuanyi','shehui','lianai','chongwu','xixue',
    'luoli','hougong','yujie','bazong','xuanhuan','gufeng','lishi','mangai',
    'youxi','chuanyue','kongbu','zhenren','kehuan','dushi','wuxia','xiuzhen',
    'shenghuo','dongzuo'
];
OrderBy = `{{get('orderBy',Get('o'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/getsortlist/?comic_sort=${link[j]}${OrderBy}&search_type=&search_key=&page={{page}}&size=48`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(40, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  更　　新  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '周一',
    '周二',
    '周三',
    '周四',
    '周五',
    '周六',
    '周日'
];
orderby = [
    '1',
    '2',
    '3',
    '4',
    '5',
    '6',
    '7'
];
Gengxin = `{{get('gengxin',Get('ci0'))}}`;
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${Gengxin}/${orderby[i]}.html`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (rank.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (rank.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','长条','大女主','百合','耽美','纯爱','後宫','韩漫',
    '奇幻','轻小说','生活','悬疑','格斗','搞笑','伪娘','竞技',
    '职场','萌系','冒险','治愈','都市','霸总','神鬼','侦探',
    '爱情','古风','欢乐向','科幻','穿越','性转换','校园','美食',
    '剧情','热血','节操','励志','异世界','历史','战争','恐怖'
];
Shudan = `{{get('shudan',Get('ci0'))}}`;
Region = `{{get('region',Get('o'))}}`;
State = `{{get('state',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${Shudan}/${Region}/${kind[j]}/${State}/{{page}}.html`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID1 = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID1; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(30, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
title = [
    '人气',
    '点击',
    '订阅',
    '更新'
];
var host = `{{Get('url')}}`;
orderby = [
    '/rank/popularity',
    '/rank/click',
    '/rank/subscribe',
    '/update/{{page}}/'
];
Time = `{{get('time',Get('t'))}}`;
for (i in title) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${orderby[i]}${Time}/`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var Url = Get('url') + '/list/';
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(Url));
var list = J.select('.filter-item')[2] ? J.select('.filter-item.clearfix')[2].select('li') : [];
O1 = `{{get('o1',Get('o'))}}`;
P1 = `{{get('p1',Get('p'))}}`;
Q1 = `{{get('q1',Get('q'))}}`;
R1 = `{{get('r1',Get('r'))}}`;
S1 = `{{get('s1',Get('s'))}}`;
for (i in list) {
    var kind = i + 1;
    var kind1 = String(list[i].select('a').attr('href')).replace(/\/list\//, '-').replace(/\/$/, '').replace(/^\-$/, '');
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/list/${O1}${P1}${kind1}${S1}${Q1}${R1}{{page}}/`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(list[i].text(), url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));

    '全部','神幻','女主','韩漫','百合','修真','恐怖','耽美',
    '穿越','悬疑','真人','古风','科幻','热血','霸总','恋爱',
    '生活','后宫','搞笑','校园'
];
link = [
    '全部','神幻','女主','韩漫','百合','修真','恐怖','耽美',
    '穿越','悬疑','真人','古风','科幻','热血','霸总','恋爱',
    '生活','后宫','搞笑','校园'
];
Area = `{{get('area',Get('o'))}}`;
End = `{{get('end',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?cate=${link[j]}&area=${Area}&end=${End}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}

JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);

title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';

    '精品榜',
    '人气榜',
    '推荐榜',
    '黑马榜',
    '更新榜',
    '新漫画'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/rank/${parseInt(i)+1}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
sort = [
    '冒险','热血','都市','玄幻','悬疑','耽美','恋爱','生活',
    '搞笑','穿越','修真','后宫','女主','古风','连载','完结'
];
for (i in sort) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/sort/${parseInt(i)+1}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(sort[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (sort.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (sort.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}

JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);

String(title).replace(/\s共.*?图/, '').replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '总榜',
    '月榜',
    '周榜',
    '日榜',
    '最近更新',
    '新书发布',
    '推荐漫画'
];
orderby = [
    '/ranking/all',
    '/ranking/monthly',
    '/ranking/weekly',
    '/ranking/daily',
    '/update',
    '/update/newbook',
    '/update/recommend'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '正妹','恋爱','出版','肉欲','浪漫','大尺度','巨乳',
    '有夫之妇','女大生','狗血剧','同居','好友','调教','动作','后宫',
    '不伦','3D','校园','耽美','日漫'
];
link = [
    '正妹','恋爱','出版漫画','肉慾','浪漫','大尺度','巨乳',
    '有夫之婦','女大生','狗血劇','同居','好友','調教','动作','後宮',
    '不倫','3D','校園','耽美','日漫'
];
Ob = `{{get('ob',Get('p'))}}`;
St = `{{get('st',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/comics/${link[j]}/ob/${Ob}/st/${St}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

    '排行榜',

    '已完结'
];

    '`${host}/top.html`',

    '`${host}/complete/?page={{page}}`'
];

}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
